system.description: When you go to find help, the Overlord will tell you who you find. If you ask for their aid, roll +Sense.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: they will not help you, and they may even mean you harm.

partial.label: Partial success.
partial.value:
choose two, or pay a price to take three. Regardless of your choices, they will help you, and they are sufficient to help with your need.

  • They will help immediately, dropping whatever they were doing
  • They ask no questions and need no explanation.
  • They demand no favors or payment.
  • You Forge A Bond with them.

success.label: Success!
success.value:
All four

  • They will help immediately, dropping whatever they were doing
  • They ask no questions and need no explanation.
  • They demand no favors or payment.
  • You Forge A Bond with them.
